text: Carol Miller (n√©e Devine; born November 4, 1950) is an American farmer, educator, and politician. She has represented West Virginia's 1st congressional district since 2019. Miller represented the 15th district in the West Virginia House of Delegates from 2007 to 2013, and the 16th district from 2013 to 2019. She is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Carol Miller official U.S. House website * Campaign website * *Carol Miller at Ballotpedia *Carol D. title: Carol Miller
